words.imagePrompt: A strong man with a giant hummer (truck) parked next to him, showing off his toughness.
words.clue: A MAN with a HUMMER (HOMBRE) is easy to remember—HOMBRE = HUMMER + BRAY!

words.imagePrompt: A woman with a cow tangled in her hair, looking frustrated but elegant.
words.clue: A WOMAN with a MOO-HAIR (MUJER) is easy to remember! MUJER = MOO + HAIR!

words.imagePrompt: A little boy kneeling ('knee') on a yo-yo, riding it like a skateboard.
words.clue: A BOY riding a KNEE-YO (NIÑO) makes it stick! NIÑO = KNEE + YO!

words.imagePrompt: A little girl kneeling while playing with a toy NASA rocket, making playful faces.
words.clue: A GIRL with a KNEE playing with NASA toys (NIÑA) makes it memorable! NIÑA = KNEE + NYA!

words.imagePrompt: A friendly cartoon arm (with a face) hugging a goat.
words.clue: Think of an ARM and a GOAT as best friends—AMIGO = ARM + GO!

words.imagePrompt: A father holding a pad and drawing a ray of sun on it, smiling proudly.
words.clue: A FATHER with a PAD drawing a RAY of sun—PADRE = PAD + RE!

words.imagePrompt: A mother baking a loaf of bread, but instead of dough, it's made of mud.
words.clue: A MOTHER baking MUD-BREAD (MADRE) makes it easy to remember! MADRE = MUD + RE!

words.imagePrompt: A brother heroically saving the day while wearing a cape that says 'MANO' (hand).
words.clue: A BROTHER is a HERO with a MANO (hand)! HERMANO = HERO + MANO!

words.imagePrompt: A sister wearing a superhero cape with 'HER' written on it, holding a banana like a phone.
words.clue: A SISTER is HER with a BANANA! HERMANA = HER + MANA(NA)!

words.imagePrompt: A group of polite people holding signs that say 'Gentle'.
words.clue: GENTE sounds like GENTLE—easy way to remember PEOPLE!

words.imagePrompt: A person wearing a tie and holding a giant tray of bagels while working at a store that sells garden hoes.
words.clue: WORKING with a TRAY of BA-gels and garden HO-es (TRABAJO) makes it easy to remember! TRABAJO = TRAY + BAGEL!

words.imagePrompt: A small child in a bustling city waving goodbye to his dad who's heading to work, with skyscrapers in the background.
words.clue: A kid in the CITY saying SEE-YOU-DAD (CIUDAD) - CIUDAD = SEE + YOU + DAD!

words.imagePrompt: A world map where all the countries are shaped like different pies (apple pie, cherry pie, etc.), with people eating slices.
words.clue: Each COUNTRY is a PIE (PAÍS) - PAÍS sounds just like PIE-EES!

words.imagePrompt: A car with a giant coach attached to it, with the coach decorated in chocolate.
words.clue: A CAR that's a COACH with CHOCOLATE (COCHE) - COCHE = COACH + CHOCOLATE!

words.imagePrompt: A glass of water with a surprised face saying 'Ah!' while a goose ('gwa') swims in it.
words.clue: WATER making you say 'AH!' while a GOOSE ('GWA') swims - AGUA = AH + GWA!

words.imagePrompt: A person saying 'Come eat, ah!' while pointing at a giant feast with a meter measuring its size.
words.clue: FOOD making you say 'COME EAT, AH!' (COMIDA) - COMIDA = COME + EAT + AH!

words.imagePrompt: A dinosaur wearing a suit and tie, sitting at a desk counting money like a banker.
words.clue: MONEY being counted by a DINO in a suit (DINERO) - DINERO = DINO + ERO!

words.imagePrompt: A historian reading a storybook filled with historical events.
words.clue: HISTORIA sounds like STORY—imagine HISTORY written as a STORY!

words.imagePrompt: A nighttime scene with someone knocking on a door that has cheese hanging from it, with stars twinkling above.
words.clue: At NIGHT, KNOCKING on a door with CHEESE (NOCHE) - NOCHE = NOCK + CHE(ESE)!

words.imagePrompt: A sleepy man eating a banana for breakfast while the morning sun rises.
words.clue: In the MORNING, a MAN with a BANANA (MAÑANA) - MAÑANA = MAN + ÑANA (like NANA/BANANA)!

words.imagePrompt: A road where a camper van is following a giant domino trail.
words.clue: A ROAD with a CAMPER following DOMINOS (CAMINO) - CAMINO = CAM + INO!

words.imagePrompt: A muscular body builder flexing while holding a cue card and wearing a colorful poncho.
words.clue: A BODY with a CUE card and PONCHO (CUERPO) - CUERPO = CUE + RPO!

words.imagePrompt: A beautiful heart-shaped coral formation glowing in a peaceful zen garden at sunset.
words.clue: A HEART made of CORAL in a ZEN garden (CORAZÓN) - CORAZÓN = CORAL + ZON!

words.imagePrompt: A bright lightbulb with cartoon eyes looking at a deer that also has a lightbulb appearing above its head.
words.clue: An IDEA comes when EYES see a DEER (IDEA) - IDEA = I + DEA!

words.imagePrompt: A well-dressed lemur in a business suit scratching its head while staring at a complex math equation on a whiteboard.
words.clue: A PROBLEM has a PRO LEMUR confused (PROBLEMA) - PROBLEMA = PRO + LEMA!

words.imagePrompt: A penguin holding up a giant question mark, looking confused.
words.clue: A PENGUIN asking a QUESTION—PREGUNTA sounds like PENGUIN!

words.imagePrompt: A person relaxing in a hammock while a puma sits at a desk taking a written test nearby.
words.clue: The ANSWER comes while RESTING as a PUMA TESTS (RESPUESTA) - RESPUESTA = REST + PUES + TA!

words.imagePrompt: Two men at a romantic dinner, one dramatically saying 'AHH... MORE!' while hearts float around them.
words.clue: LOVE makes you say 'AHH... MORE!' (AMOR) - AMOR = AH + MORE!

words.imagePrompt: A happy cat in a city full of other cats throwing confetti and wearing party hats.
words.clue: HAPPINESS is a FELINE in the CITY (FELICIDAD) - FELICIDAD = FELI(NE) + CIDAD!

words.imagePrompt: A person with comically large ears sitting on a couch, peacefully listening to music with headphones.
words.clue: To LISTEN with EARS on a COUCH (ESCUCHAR) - ESCUCHAR = ES + CUCHA + R!
